sentence.Network_en: Some people moved in silky, liquid movements, others were jerky, probably drunk.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些人动作平稳流畅，其他人则跌跌撞撞，大概是喝醉了。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Griffin made a jerky gesture.
sentence.Network_cn: 格里芬先生急匆匆地做了个手势。

sentence.Network_en: She lit a cigarette with quick , jerky movement.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用急促的动作点着了香烟.
